amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to enforce section 435 of the bill which limits the ability of U.S. environmental agencies to take action to improve public health and fight the root causes of climate change.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to enforce section 435 of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A064) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A064) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Peters.
